quiz: A: Hi, I’m Sam. I ____ from Korea. B: Nice to meet you.
korean: A: 안녕, 나는 Sam이야. 나는 Korea에서 왔어. B: 만나서 반가워.

quiz: What do you ______ the most?
I'm _____ to try a new recipe.

A: It’s a good idea to ______. B: I’ll give it a shot.
korean: A: 공부를 열심히 하는 것이 좋은 생각이야. B: 한 번 해볼게.

quiz: May I ___ your eraser?
I believe this idea is ___.
B: It's ___ I missed the bus.
korean: B: 버스를 놓친 이유는 알람이 울리지 않아서야.

quiz: My dream is to become ______. I hope to be a doctor.

quiz: Everything will be okay. You can do it. ___ positive. You've got this.
korean: 모든 것이 괜찮을 거야. 너는 할 수 있어. 긍정적으로 있어. 넌 이길 수 있어.

quiz: A: ___ this pizza?
You ___ to use your phone in class.

quiz: How about this restaurant? You should ___.

She ___ not bored with the challenges.

The mentor ___ us a useful tip.

quiz: They went to the park ____ sketch nature.
How ___ the characters appear!
I ___ have extra stickers.

korean: 그들은 할인 쿠폰을 모으는 것을 즐겨요.

quiz: He plans ___ the museum soon.

It makes my heart ___.
______ to meet you.
I like ______.

quiz: Can you tell me how to get to ___?

quiz: My friend enjoys ____ basketball.
Is she ___ join the picnic tomorrow?

quiz: I ate fruits ___ stay energetic.

quiz: Teachers explain clearly ___ guide students.
My shoes are ___ for a marathon.

quiz: She ___ saving water at home.
Busan offers the ___ seas.
This is Hyunwoo Park, _______.

quiz: My parents ___ feel my appreciation always.

quiz: How ___ the fruit salad is!

quiz: She will ___ her brother a toy.
The fresh breeze feels lovely, ___?
korean: 상쾌한 바람이 정말 좋게 느껴져요, 그렇지 않아요?

quiz: The green ___ is in the garden.
___ to meet you.
I ____ ice cream.
A: Where can I ___ my teacher? B: He’s at the office.

quiz: A: What is he ______ right now?
Would you mind ___ me with these documents? Sure, I'd be happy to.

quiz: How about taking a break? I think you should ___.

quiz: A: What were you ______?
A: ___ did you think about the movie? B: It was interesting.

quiz: A: How’s the weather? B: It’s __.

quiz: It’s a good idea to ___.
I like to ___.
My dream is to be ___.

quiz: Enjoy your day! Hope you have a ______ day!
korean: 오늘 하루 즐기세요! 멋진 하루 되길 바래요!

quiz: A: Can you give me your opinion on/about ___? B: I think that it is impressive.
korean: A: 이 아이디어에 대해 너의 의견을 말해줄 수 있어? B: 나는 그것이 인상적이라고 생각해.

He ___ always cheerful.
Do you ___ clubs after school?
___ the wise words.

quiz: I want to ______ a team meeting.

quiz: I ___ gain new ideas from every tale.

quiz: There ___ many bright stars in the night sky.

quiz: The meeting room ___ bright even in the evening.

___ our meeting started, I felt ready.
A: What's your ____ food? B: Sushi is my favorite.

What ___?

quiz: A: Can you ___ your brother? B: He is kind.

A: Do you know where ___ is?
I'm _____ visit my friend.
A: When shall we ______?
Yes, I like ___.

quiz: A: Are you looking for something? B: Yes, do you sell ___?

quiz: B: It ___ 50 dollars.
What's your ____ on this movie? B: My opinion is that it's really exciting.
korean: 이 영화에 대한 네 의견은 무엇이니? B: 내 의견은 정말 신난다는 거야.

quiz: A: I'd like to ______ the school festival. B: Sure, it will be held next Friday.

quiz: They ___ excited to learn.
They ___ eating lunch at school.
She ___ smile even on tough days.

quiz: He wants ___ how to dance.

quiz: Drink ___ water.
Which hairstyle do you ___, short or long?

quiz: When my friend ___ in middle school, she performed in a school play.

quiz: She ___ save her allowance for a new game.

quiz: I ate ___ heartier food in Korea.

quiz: What a ___ sunset!
A: ___, my name is Mike. I’m 14. B: Nice meeting you, too.
korean: A: 만나서 반가워, 내 이름은 Mike야. 14살이야. B: 나도 만나서 반가워.

quiz: A: Which book do you like the most? B: My favorite is Harry Potter. It’s really ____.
korean: A: 어느 책을 제일 좋아해? B: 내가 제일 좋아하는 책은 해리 포터야. 정말 흥미진진해.

quiz: A: ______! B: Thanks for letting me know.
A: What is John ___ right now?

korean: 이 가방을 나르는 것을 도와줄 수 있니?

quiz: Oh, that’s great news! I’m so ___ to hear that.
korean: 오, 좋은 소식이네! 그 말을 들으니 정말 기뻐.

quiz: A: What are you __________ do in Korea? B: I’m planning to learn Korean.

quiz: A: Excuse me, can you tell me how to get to the ____?
korean: 실례합니다, 도서관에 어떻게 가는지 알려주실 수 있나요?

B: Sorry, I don't ___.

B: I’m really __________ about it.

korean: A: 매일 공부해야 해. B: 알겠어.

quiz: A: ___ just happened.
B: How about ___?
Tom ___ very tall now.
_____ quickly if you see danger.
She ___ snacks for everyone.

quiz: My calculator is ______ than yours.

quiz: She wants ______.

quiz: He likes ___ during free time.

quiz: They ___ their bikes in the park.

quiz: B: I often ___ and watch TV.

quiz: A: What's your opinion on _____? B: In my opinion, it's great.

quiz: A: ___ of these shoes? B: They cost 50 dollars.
korean: A: 이 신발 가격은 얼마예요? B: 50달러입니다.

quiz: Do you ___ books? No, I don't.

quiz: A: How’s it ___?

quiz: A: How about ___?
A: You can ___ a magnificent statue in the plaza.

B: It’s because I ______.

___ me some more balloons, please.

quiz: What a ______ heart!

korean: A: 어떻게 영어를 공부해? B: 왜냐하면 여행을 가고 싶어서. A: 무엇이 너를 영어 공부하게 만드는가? B: 그건 여행을 가고 싶기 때문이야.

___ you attend school events regularly?

quiz: A: Let me ___ you to my friend. B: Hello, it's nice to meet you.

quiz: Could you ___?
A: I ___ you. B: It's my pleasure.
korean: A: 나는 너에게 감사해. B: 천만에요.

quiz: A: Do you have a favorite ______?
A: Can I ___ you some tea? B: Yes, I'd love to.
korean: A: 제가 차를 좀 권할까요? B: 네, 좋아요.

quiz: B: Because of ____.
I ____ bad for you.

korean: A: 내 연필이 어디에 있니? B: 연필은 필통 안에 있어.

quiz: They are ______ soccer.

korean: A: 공원에 갈까? B: 정말 좋네.

quiz: Could you ___?

quiz: I’m fed up with ___.
___ snack did you pick at the party?
The sculpture ____ by dedicated workers.
korean: 그 조각상은 헌신적인 노동자들에 의해 보존되었어요.

quiz: It is ___ to help each other on the field.
korean: 서로 돕는 것이 현장에서 아주 중요해요.

quiz: I have ___ the forecast already.
She is someone _____
korean: 그녀는 매일 조깅하는 것을 선호하는 사람이에요.

quiz: Can you tell ______?
korean: 그의 이웃이 어떤 일을 했는지 알려주실 수 있어요?
option_1: what his neighbor did for work
option_2: why his neighbor did for work
option_3: when his neighbor did for work

quiz: They bought a ticket ___ the concert.
He ____ his teacher to explain the difficult grammar.
korean: 그는 선생님에게 어려운 문법을 설명해 달라고 요청했어요.

quiz: Can you trust ____ a little more?
He designs ___.
korean: 그는 주목할 만한 공예품뿐만 아니라 독특한 장식품도 디자인해요.
option_1: not only remarkable crafts but also unique decorations
option_2: only remarkable crafts but also unique decorations
option_3: not only remarkable crafts, unique decorations

quiz: Tom is brave ___ to try new things.
korean: Tom은 새로운 것을 시도하기에 충분히 용감해요.

quiz: The farmer waters the garden ___ the crops grow well.
korean: 농부가 작물이 잘 자라게 하기 위해 정원을 물줘요.

quiz: She had better ______.
korean: 그녀는 당분이 많은 음료를 피하는 게 좋을 거예요.

quiz: Rarely ___ these careers offer easy work.
korean: 이 직업들은 드물게 쉬운 일을 제공해요.

quiz: He ___ have watched a popular K-drama.
korean: 그는 인기 있는 한국 드라마를 틀림없이 봤을 거예요.

quiz: There were ___ signs that indicated the right direction.
korean: 오른 방향을 나타내는 표지판들이 거의 없었어요.

quiz: A: What do you like to do in your free time? B: I like to ___ .
korean: A: 여가 시간에 무엇을 하는 것을 좋아하세요? B: 나는 책을 읽는 것을 좋아해요.

quiz: A: Can you tell me about the ___ of music you like?
korean: A: 음악의 종류에 대해 말해줄 수 있나요?

quiz: A: Can you tell me where the ___ is?
korean: A: 서점이 어디에 있는지 말해줄 수 있어요?

quiz: B: Follow the signs and ___ right.
B: It costs ___.
B: Yes, we can offer a ___ discount.
korean: B: 네, 10% 할인을 제공할 수 있어요.

quiz: Can you ______ how the car looks?
A: Could you ___ the event? B: Sure, the event is amazing.
korean: 이벤트에 대한 자세한 정보를 알려줄 수 있어? 이벤트는 멋져.

quiz: B: I feel ______.
_____ turn off the lights before leaving.
korean: 나가기 전에 불을 끄는 것을 기억하세요.

quiz: I’m ______ visit my grandparents this weekend.
korean: 나는 이번 주말에 조부모님을 방문할 거야.

quiz: B: Let's meet at ___.
A: Do you ___ about the new policy change? B: Yes, I do. / No, I don't.
I _____ about space travel. I'd like to know more about space travel.
korean: 나는 우주 여행에 대해 궁금해하고, 더 알고 싶어.

quiz: A: Is it OK ___ I borrow your book?
You're not allowed to ___.
She can always ___ me kind words.
korean: 그녀는 항상 제게 친절한 말을 해줄 수 있어요.

quiz: You ___ visit a local festival.
The new idea ___ developed by the team.
Students ___ were passionate about nature visited the zoo.
korean: 자연에 열정을 가진 학생들이 동물원을 방문했어요.

quiz: A doctor ___ advises healthy eating prepared the meal plan.
korean: 건강한 식습관을 조언하는 의사가 식단을 준비했어요.

quiz: Sam saw a man ____ in the park.
korean: 샘은 공원에서 한 남자가 조깅하는 것을 봤어요.

quiz: She has ___ zero gravity.
Please tell me ___ the ceremony was held.
korean: 제발 행사장이 어디에서 개최되었는지 말씀해 주세요.

quiz: ___ my teacher and I share a love for music.
korean: 제 선생님과 저는 음악에 대한 사랑을 나눠요.

quiz: I practice English ___ a school club.
korean: 저는 영어를 연습해서 학교 동아리에 가입해요.

quiz: She ___ her brother to join the recycling club.
korean: 그녀는 오빠가 재활용 클럽에 가입하길 원해요.

quiz: ___ you explore the jungle, you will meet incredible animals.
korean: 만약 정글을 탐험하면, 놀라운 동물들을 만날 거예요.

quiz: I ___ fresh air a treasure.
Lisa was so ____ that she shared her lunch.
korean: 리사는 너무 행복해서 점심을 나눠 먹었어요.

quiz: It is fun ___ explore new planets.
She improved her skills ___ constant practice.
korean: 그녀는 꾸준한 연습 덕분에 기술이 향상되었어요.

quiz: Do you have any advice for ________?
korean: 영어 실력을 향상시키기 위한 조언이 있나요?

quiz: A: Why don't we _____? B: Sounds good. / Sorry, I'm busy.
korean: A: 우리 산책하는 건 어때? B: 좋은데. / 미안, 바빠.

quiz: B: I’m ________ that you'll do well.
korean: B: 나는 네가 잘 할 것이라고 확신해.

quiz: A: What kind of person is she? B: She is ___ and friendly.
korean: A: 그녀는 어떤 사람인가요? B: 그녀는 인내심 있고 다정해요.

quiz: A: Do you ___ tea or coffee?
korean: A: 차와 커피 중 무엇을 선호하나요?

quiz: A: Can you tell me why you ___?
korean: A: 왜 공부하는지 말해줄 수 있니?

quiz: I ___ read magazines.
A: Did you try ______ before? B: Yes, I did. / No, I didn’t.
korean: A: 이전에 스쿠버 다이빙 해본 적 있어? B: 응, 해봤어. / 아니, 없었어.

quiz: B: Follow the road and ___.
A: How long does it _____ to finish the homework? B: It usually takes about two hours.
korean: 숙제를 끝내는 데 보통 2시간 정도 걸려요.

quiz: A: Are you ___ with the meeting schedule? B: Yes, I am. It is confirmed.
korean: A: 회의 일정에 대해 익숙해? B: 응, 익숙해. 확정되었어.

quiz: B: It’s for ______.
A: Can you ______ a good book?
Do you ___ it?
Could you ___ with these bags?
A: ___ it’s going to be windy today.
korean: 오늘 바람이 많이 불 것 같아.

quiz: She decided ___ her story openly.
korean: 그녀는 자신의 이야기를 공개적으로 나누기로 결정했어요.

quiz: My brother ___ excited since the game started.
korean: 저의 형은 경기 시작한 이후로 신났어요.

quiz: The concert ___ by many fans.
Our team is made up of members ___ never quit.
korean: 우리 팀은 절대 포기하지 않는 멤버들로 이루어져 있어요.

quiz: It is ______ to learn new words every day.
korean: 매일 새로운 단어를 배우는 것이 흥미로워요.

quiz: A rocket launch is about ______ as loud as a school bell.
korean: 로켓 발사는 학교 종보다 약 세 배나 시끄러워요.

quiz: The game was ______ that we played it for hours.
korean: 그 게임은 너무 스릴 넘쳐서 몇 시간 동안 했어요.

quiz: I found something ___ near the park.
korean: 저는 공원 근처에서 뭔가 독특한 것을 찾았어요.

quiz: ______ carefully, and answer my questions.
korean: 주의 깊게 들으세요, 그리고 제 질문에 대답하세요.

quiz: He ___ the teacher to explain the assignment.
___ you practice every day, progress will follow.
That mountain is the ___ in our town.
korean: 저 산은 우리 동네에서 가장 가파른이에요.

quiz: He can ___ the wind whispering through the trees.
korean: 그는 나무 사이로 속삭이는 바람을 들을 수 있어요.

quiz: ______ telescopes are advanced, stars remain distant.
korean: 비록 망원경이 발전되었지만, 별들은 여전히 멀리 있어요.
